meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to differ (from); to be different; to be distinct; to be unlike; to vary; to disagree (with) その点では私は君と意見が違う。I differ from you on that point.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be wrong; to be incorrect; to be mistaken そんなばかなことを言うなんて彼は気でも違ったのか。Is he mad that he should say such a foolish thing?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to become abnormal; to go wrong See also 気が違う君は違う方にいきますよ。You're going the wrong way.
4. isn't it?; wasn't it? Kansai dialect, at sentence-end; oft. as 〜のと違うか

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to differ; to be different 運んできてくれたランチは噂に違わず旨かった。The lunch she brought to me was as delicious as rumoured.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to run counter to

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to change (into something out of the ordinary)

meanings.meaning: 1. illegal; illicit; unlawful
1. uncomfortable feeling; feeling out of place; sense of discomfort これまで我が社にそうしたシステムがなかったけど、別に違和感はないよ。Our company has never had that kind of system, and it's never made us feel uncomfortable.
2. malaise; physical unease
1. uncomfortable feeling; feeling out of place; sense of discomfort これまで我が社にそうしたシステムがなかったけど、別に違和感はないよ。Our company has never had that kind of system, and it's never made us feel uncomfortable.
2. malaise; physical unease

sentences.translation: Our company has never had that kind of system, and it's never made us feel uncomfortable.

meanings.meaning: 1. to change; to alter 彼は約束をたがえない。He is as good as his word.
2. to run counter to; to go against; to break (one's word) ビルは時間を違えないことはめったにない。Bill is seldom ever on time.
3. to make a mistake (in); to err
1. to change; to alter
2. to mistake; to make a mistake
3. to fail to keep (e.g. one's promise) See also たがえる, See also たがえる
4. to sprain (a muscle); to dislocate (e.g. one's neck)

sentences.translation: He is as good as his word.
Bill is seldom ever on time.

差違 【さい】
1. to make a mistake (in); to commit an error (e.g. in calculation) あなたがたは間違えることを怖がる必要はありません。You needn't be afraid of making mistakes.
2. to confuse; to mistake something for something else アンタ駅を間違えたようだぜ。You've got the wrong station.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to not match well (e.g. at the seams); to not mesh properly (of gears)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to differ (e.g. of opinions); to clash; to be in conflict (e.g. with the facts); to run counter (to); to be inconsistent (with); to be contradictory 私たちの意見が食い違うのはこの点です。It is on this point that our opinions differ.
食違う 【くいちがう】

sentences.translation: It is on this point that our opinions differ.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to pass (by) each other; to brush past 通りですれ違った時私をわざと無視した。He deliberately ignored me when I passed him in the street.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to miss (meeting) each other; to fail to meet

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be at odds; to clash; to be in conflict
擦れ違う 【すれちがう】

sentences.translation: He deliberately ignored me when I passed him in the street.

meanings.meaning: 1. certain; sure; no doubt この列車に間違いないですか。Are you sure this is the right train?
2. reliable; dependable
間違い無い 【まちがいない】

sentences.translation: Are you sure this is the right train?
